title: I Stole Mr Beast's DNA To Make Cheese
description: In this video, Max Fosh pretends to steal Mr. Beast's DNA to make cheese as a prank.
summary: Max Fosh jokes about stealing Mr. Beast's DNA to make cheese, pretending to take it seriously.
payoff: The payoff comes when Max reveals that he actually just used a DNA testing kit to determine Mr. Beast's ancestry, not actually stealing his DNA. The absurdity of the premise and the deadpan delivery make it funny and surprising.
